name: MapleStory Cosmetic Pack
detailed_description:
Get yourself a whole new look and wow everyone in Maple World with the Aren't I Beautiful? cosmetic package. This package comes with coupons to change your hair/face/skin, a random chair, a random damage skin, and some cute teddy bear equips, all for a low, low price!



  • Hair Style Coupon (VIP) (90-day duration)
    Take this coupon to a hair stylist to permanently change your hair style and make a fashion statement! You get to select your new style from a list of options. Hair stylists can be found in most major towns. Make sure to use this coupon soon, as it will expire in 90 days.

  • Hair Color Coupon (VIP) (90-day duration)
    Get a new color to go with your new ‘do! Take this coupon to a hair stylist to permanently change your hair color. You get to select your new hair color from a list of options. Hair stylists can be found in most major towns. Make sure to use this coupon soon, as it will expire in 90 days.

  • Face Coupon (VIP) (90-day duration)
    Take this coupon to a plastic surgeon to permanently change your face style and become a whole new you! You get to select your new face style from a list of options. Plastic surgeons can be found in most major towns. Make sure to use this coupon soon, as it will expire in 90 days.

  • Skin Coupon (90-day duration)
    Take this coupon to a skin care shop to permanently change your skin tone to something different! You get to select your new skin tone from a list of options. Skin care shops can be found in most major towns. Make sure to use this coupon soon, as it will expire in 90 days.

  • Chair Gachapon Ticket (90-day duration)
    Do you need a fun chair for when you’re hanging out in Maple World? Use the Chair Gachapon Ticket, guaranteed to give you one amazing permanent chair! You’ll receive one random chair. Make sure to use this ticket soon, as it will expire in 90 days.

  • Damage Skin Random Box (14-day duration)
    Are you tired of seeing the same old damage meters on your screen? Open this box and receive one random damage skin coupon! Use the coupon to permanently change the way your damage meters look. Make sure to use this box soon, as it will expire in 14 days.



  • Teddy Bear (Permanent duration)
    Give your weapon a new look with this equipment cover. Wear it over your weapon to make it look like you’re fighting with a little teddy bear!

  • Brown Teddy Label Ring (Permanent duration)
    Wear this ring to make your character name look cute! Your character name that displays under your character avatar will appear surrounded by adorable teddy bears.

  • Teddy Bear Quote Ring (Permanent duration)
    Wear this ring to make your character chat look cute! When you chat in a map, the quote bubble comes out decorated with adorable teddy bears.



  • Teddy Bear Balloon (Permanent duration)
    Wear this special cape and your character will look like it has a cute teddy bear balloon!

  • Teddy Bear Headgear (Permanent duration)
    Teddy Bear Costume (Permanent duration)
    Teddy Bear Gloves (Permanent duration)
    Teddy Bear Shoes (Permanent duration)
    It’s fun to dress up in Maple World! Wear these equipment covers over your regular equipment and you’ll look just like a big teddy bear.



Content is only redeemable in non-Reboot worlds.

short_description: Get yourself a whole new look and wow everyone in Maple World with the Aren't I Beautiful? cosmetic package. This package comes with coupons to change your hair/face/skin, a random chair, a random damage skin, and some cute teddy bear equips, all for a low, low price!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7 or later
  • Processor:Intel Core Duo 2.4Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.4Ghz
  • Memory:2GB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce 8600 GH / ATI Radeon HD 3450
  • Hard Drive:At least 14GB of free space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • We recommend that you install DirectX version 9.0 or higher for the client to run smoothly
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7 or later
  • Processor:Intel Core Duo 3.0Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 3.0Ghz
  • Memory:at least 4GB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce 9600 / ATI Radeon HD 3870 or higher
  • Hard Drive:At least 14GB of free space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • We recommend that you install DirectX version 9.0 or higher for the client to run smoothly
